description: James Lister and Bryan Prunty hit doubles as Airdrieonians come from behind to see off rock-bottom Stirling Albion.
title: Airdrieonians 4-1 Stirling Albion
maintext:
James Lister and Bryan Prunty hit second-half doubles as Airdrieonians came from behind to see off rock-bottom Stirling Albion in League One.
Ross McGeachie bundled the ball home to give the visitors an early lead after Lewis Coult's header hit the post.
The hosts levelled after the break when Prunty scored from the spot after keeper Greg Paterson downed Lister.
Lister's cross nestled in the net to make it 2-1 and he added the third before Prunty completed the scoring.
